idea-plugin.name: POJO to JSON/TypeScript
idea-plugin.description:
A plugin to generate JSON examples and TypeScript interface definitions from Java POJO classes.

Features:

  • Right-click on Java classes to generate JSON with random values
  • Generate TypeScript interfaces from Java classes
  • Configurable type mappings and package-level settings
  • Results automatically copied to clipboard
  • Support for complex nested objects and collections
  • Circular reference detection

Usage:

  1. Right-click on a Java class file in Project View or Editor tab
  2. Select "Generate JSON" or "Generate TypeScript Interface"
  3. The generated content will be copied to your clipboard
  4. Configure settings in File -> Settings -> Tools -> POJO to JSON/TS
